title: Heimerdinger advanced Gameplay!
body:
I have an idea for a heimerdinger rework:
We all known about {{champion:112}} and his optional items. Wouldn't it be nice to do the same on {{champion:74}} ???

The Item were like power ups for his turrets like more health or faster shooting etc. 
Short: You can increase your turrets positively against your opponents.
This might be a better way to make Heimerdinger more skillfull to play and even better against top-laner like {{champion:122}} or{{champion:92}} which are pretty much OP

replies.body:
nette idee aber erstens hat er erst ein rework bekommen also bezweifel ich dass er ein zweites bekommt.
und zweitens hat er gegen melees wie riven und darius sowieso wenig probleme und allgemein ist heimerdinger zur zeit an einem guten/balanced platz
